name: The Island (itch) (Revolution Game)
description:
Created for MGJ24 2022, Silent Kitchen Jam 2023 and Clover Jam (Since this game is specially made to fit the theme of these three game jams). You are all alone on this isolated island!

You found out that there are enough resources for you to survive. The only two things that are a pain for your survival is the freezing cold and ghosts that live on this island. You must adapt to survive and do your best!

How to Play?
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Attack

Make sure that your health doesn't reach zero while keeping yourself warm by chopping trees (seems normal)!

Remember, if you are standing nearby a tree and chopping it, no enemy will take damage even if they are in your attack range!
